attributes.action: give the best possible preferential health treatment to any smoker or ex -smoker free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: economically smokers provide a vast amount of tax revenue much of which is directed towards the NHS. many people became addicted to smoking without being made fully aware of the health implications and have therefore paid much more towards the health service than non smokers. Therefore, a policy of positive descrimination towards smokers should be followed.
